name: Button tags
description: Use the button classes on an <a>, <button>, or <input> element.

options.name: Options
options.description: Use any of the available button classes to quickly create a styled button.

sizes.name: Sizes
sizes.description: Fancy larger or smaller buttons? Add .btn-lg, .btn-sm, or .btn-xs for additional sizes.

active.name: Active state
active.description: No need to add :active as it's a pseudo-class, but if you need to force the same appearance, go ahead and add .active.
